about_experience: My expertise lies in JavaScript and TypeScript development within the Node.js environment. I am proficient in leveraging Docker for the creation, deployment, and execution of applications encapsulated within containers. Additionally, I am adept at using Git for version control. My technical skills encompass a wide range of technologies and frameworks, including HTML, CSS, JS, TS, SCSS, Pug, Bootstrap 5, Vue, Nuxt, and Express. This diverse skill set enables me to deliver robust and efficient solutions tailored to specific project requirements. You can find some examples of my work
